com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.archetypes: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Shieldon you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
Armor Fossil Shieldon
Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Put any number of Basic Pokémon you find there onto your opponent's Bench.
Captivating Poké Puff
Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Anorith you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
Claw Fossil Anorith
Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Gardevoir-EX.
Gardevoir Spirit Link
You can play this card only if you took it as a face-down Prize card, before you put it into your hand.Flip a coin. If heads, take 1 more Prize card.
Greedy Dice

Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and switch it with that Pokémon. (Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle the first Pokémon into your deck.
Ninja Boy
Remove all effects of attacks on each player and his or her Pokémon.
Pokémon Ranger
Remove all effects of attacks on each player and his or her Pokémon.
Pokémon Ranger
Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
Professor Sycamore
Shuffle 2 Special Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.
Special Charge
Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Steelix-EX.
Steelix Spirit Link
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.decks.pcds: Spin up a great engine of battle with the Mythical Pokémon Volcanion! Combine the steely determination of Klinklang with the leaping speed of Monferno, and seize the power of steam. All aboard the victory train!

Bring forth lightning and psychic shocks with the Mythical Pokémon Hoopa! Galvantula's electric webs and the surging power of Ampharos keep the current flowing and give your opponent quite a shock. Call down the thunder!
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.eventtrigg: Won with Gears of Fire Reward
Won with Ring of Lightning Reward
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.products.b: Thank you for attending your local Pokémon League! This code will unlock a foil Yveltal promo card and a set of XY—Steam Siege themed card sleeves for you to enjoy or trade!
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 70 more damage.

Discard 1 {R} Energy and 1 {L} Energy attached to this Pokémon.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
This Pokémon can't use Pitfall during your next turn.
This Pokémon can't use Portal Strike during your next turn.
Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. Attach a {R} Energy card from your discard pile to each of those Pokémon.
Put 2 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.

Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 70 more damage.
This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, if this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's next turn, it is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.
Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon. Put 8 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.
Discard 3 Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
This attack does 10 damage times the number of your Pawniard.
Search your deck for Nidoran♀ and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon equal to the damage done to this Pokémon.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.
During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Move as many damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokémon as you like to any of your opponent's other Pokémon in any way you like.
Discard as many {D} Energy attached to your Pokémon as you like. This attack does 50 damage times the amount of {D} Energy you discarded in this way.
Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing.

Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Special Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Mega Evolution Pokémon.
If you have exactly 4 cards in your hand, ignore all Energy in the attack cost of each of this Pokémon’s attacks.
If this Pokémon is in your hand when you are setting up to play, you may put it face down as your Active Pokémon.

If you have exactly 4 cards in your hand, ignore all Energy in the attack cost of each of this Pokémon’s attacks.

Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {R} Energy card from your hand. If you do, during this turn, your Basic {R} Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may put a Pokémon Tool card attached to 1 of your Pokémon into your hand.

Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may discard all cards attached to this Pokémon and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon as a Pokémon Tool card. Prevent any damage done to the Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent's Mega Evolution Pokémon. If this card is attached to a Pokémon, discard this card at the end of your opponent's turn.

product.xy11.3-pk.blister.azelf.name: 3-Pack Bundle: Azelf
product.xy11.3-pk.blister.azelf.sell-tex: Get in on the latest Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs from the new XY—Steam Siege expansion, a special holographic promo card featuring Azelf, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! INCLUDES: 3 booster packs, 1 coin, and a foil promo card!
product.xy11.3-pk.blister.rayquaza.name: 3-Pack Bundle: Rayquaza
product.xy11.3-pk.blister.rayquaza.sell-: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs, a special foil card, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! This bundle contains: 1 foil Rayquaza Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY141) 3 XY—Steam Siege booster packs (10-card) 1 Fennekin coin
product.xy11.checklane.blister.floette.s: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with an awesome booster pack, a special foil card, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! This bundle contains: 1 foil Floette Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY139) 1 XY—Steam Siege booster pack (10-card) 1 Fennekin coin
product.xy11.checklane.blister.lucario.s: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with an awesome booster pack, a special foil card, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! This bundle contains: 1 foil Lucario Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY140) 1 XY—Steam Siege booster pack (10-card) 1 Fennekin coin
